name: Hellfire (itch) (JimmyDoh)
description:
A 3D Tower Defense game that takes place in Hell where you try and ward off demons with your futuristic high-powered artillery gun. Has difficulty levels based on how close the demons can spawn to you, how fast they can move, and how many can spawn at once. Final boss battle will spawn many at once in a final push by the demons to kill you once and for all. Very simple and straight forward game coded entirely by me and re-using free assets on the Unity Asset store for a college project to showcase several different coding techniques and methods. Only in-game asset made entirely by me is the particle effects seen on the skulls.  Hope you enjoy!

Low-Poly Skull by: Ervis Lilaj

TurretA by: Ogasoda

Cracked stone filled with lava by: MikeLarg
